recipes.title: Fettuccine Alfredo
recipes.description: A creamy pasta dish prepared with fettuccine noodles with a rich Alfredo sauce of butter, milk, and Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.description: A traditional Italian dish made up of a flat, round dough baked with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and other ingredients.

recipes.title: Chicken Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned chicken, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and salsa can have soft or hard shells.
